scMiko 0.1.0
  • Reference

Wrapper to run GO enrichment, using fisher enrichment method

runEnrichment.Rd

Wrapper to run GO enrichment, using fisher enrichment method. Builds on TopGo functionality.

runEnrichment(
  gene.list,
  gene.universe,
  species,
  p.threshold = 0.01,
  p.adj.threshold = 0.05
)

Arguments

gene.list

named list of gene sets to query, where name specify name of gene set, and entry is vector of gene symbols.
gene.universe

background genes
species

Species: Hs or Mm
p.threshold

numeric specifying p value threshold. Default is 0.01.
p.adj.threshold

numeric specifing adjusted p value threshold. Defulat is 0.05.

Value

list of data.frames. results.table.p contains unadjusted results, results.table.bh contains BH-adjusted results.

See also

enrichGO.fisher

Author

Nicholas Mikolajewicz

Examples


enrichment.list <- runEnrichment(module.list, gene.universe = all.genes, species = "Hs")
